text: Merrill Mason Gaffney (October 18, 1923 â€“ July 16, 2020) was an American economist. He was a major critic of Neoclassical economics from a Georgist point of view. After serving in the southwest Pacific during World War II. Gaffney was Professor of Economics at the University of California, Riverside beginning in 1976. He was born in New York. Gaffney died on July 16, 2020 in Riverside, California at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American economists Category:Writers from New York (state) Category:Writers from California
